title: Micromotor-assisted bifunctional platform for efficient detection and removal of aniline
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00097H, Paper
Ningning Xing, Yangsai Lyu, Weilin Zhao, Ziwei Lan, Min Zuo, Jia Li
The study of combining the catalytic activity of nanomaterials to the self-propelled micro/nanomotors is rapidly growing for determining and degrading contaminates in the water environment, especially in constructing a cost-effective...
